answers.answer: Im not sure about refusing it but im asking to be induced

I am also a GD patient and if doctors want to induce I'm going to refuse unless they can give me proof that I have to be induced. They don't want me going past due date either. Going in Thursday to talk with GD doctor and find out my options. I want natural if I can. Also heard that if you start contractions or water break that if you hold off a short while till going yo hospital less chance of c sec unless baby is not turned.

question: I really don't want to be induced, but one dr said I should be and set a date for 5 says before my due date, and another dr said because I am on such a small dose of meds that I can refuse it but not to really go past my due date without the induction anyway!I am curious if there are any others that were/are on literally the tiniest bit of meds/on meds at all that have either refused the induction or have opted for the induction...I'm just trying to make a decision and as of right now I hate the idea of being induced but at the same time I am soooooooooo done with being pregnant!Btw I'm 37 weeks 2 days and scheduled for the induction in 2 weeks. Thanks!!!!
title: Question about induction when you have GD
